data.title: Demystifying the Higgs Boson with Leonard Susskind
data.meta_description: (July 30, 2012) Professor Susskind presents an explanation of what the Higgs mechanism is, and what it means to "give mass to particles." He also explains what's at stake for the future of physics and cosmology.
